name: POV Imminent Penetration [1 MB]
description:
This is a simple concept LoRA for Imminent penetration.

I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results.

Always add this to the prompt with the LoRA to activate it: 1boy, penis, imminent penetration, lying, on back, spread legs.

You can combine this with my POV Doggystyle LoRA at 0.4-0.6 weight to create a Imminent penetration doggystyle effect.

  • Remove the tags - lying, on back, spread legs (optional)

  • Add the POV Doggystyle LoRA and from behind to prompt.

  • <lora:IPV1:0.9>, 1boy, penis, imminent penetration, <lora:POVDoggy:0.5>, from behind

You can also combine this with my POV Squatting Cowgirl LoRA at 0.4-0.6 weight to create a imminent penetration squatting cowgirl effect.

  • Remove the tags - lying, on back

  • Add the POV Cowgirl LoRA and squatting to prompt.

  • <lora:IPV1:0.9>, 1boy, penis, imminent penetration, spread legs, <lora:PSCowgirl:0.4>, squatting

This was trained on NAI model - I have no idea if it works on realistic models. Images were generated on Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix using the Orange Mix VAE. The last two LoRAs seemed to work with realistic models though.

Embeds and LoRA used: Bad Prompt - Bea - Afrobull Style - POV Squatting Cowgirl - POV Doggystyle - Kakure Eria Style

Be sure to leave a comment, review and check out my other stuff here - you might like it.

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
